description: Match shift scopes against a tender.
permissions: Requires permission to create the related tender (delegated policy). For broker tenders: admin or broker member of the buyer broker. For customer tenders: admin, buyer customer member, or seller broker member.
validation_notes: --tender is required. Exactly one of --rate or --shift-set-time-card-constraint is required; they cannot both be set. Server requires tender and shift_scope; if --shift-scope is omitted it is derived from the selected rate or shift set time card constraint. If the selected rate/constraint has a parent, the parent is used. If --shift-scope is provided and does not match the rate's effective shift scope or the constraint's shift scope, the mismatched rate/constraint is cleared. Match SQL is only returned when --show-matching-shift-sql is true and the user is an admin.

flags.name: --rate
flags.validation: Required if --shift-set-time-card-constraint is not set; cannot be set together with --shift-set-time-card-constraint.

flags.name: --shift-set-time-card-constraint
flags.description: Shift set time card constraint ID
flags.validation: Required if --rate is not set; cannot be set together with --rate.

flags.name: --show-matching-shift-sql
flags.validation: Match SQL is only returned for admin users when this flag is true.
